name: Dubstep Legendary Hero
description:
Play free imitation of music. Train your precision reflexes help of this unique and fun game. After tapping the drives and precision timing and rhythm are receiving scores. You have to catch the stars rushing to beat. Enjoy beautiful graphics and visual effects. This application was created for fans of dubstep, electric and acoustic musical instruments. Become a true hero music.


Game features:
- Three points of difficulty
- Online Multiplayer
- Online leaderboards.
- Advanced 3D graphics with smooth reflections.
- Lights with glow effects, and beautifully colored particle effects.

For more details about authors of songs visit our web site.
